definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
money is omnipotent (idiom)/with money, you can do anything/money talks
money is not omnipotent/money isn't everything/money can't buy you love
money isn't everything, but without money you can do nothing (idiom)
pinyin: qian2 bu4 shi4 wan4 neng2 de5 , mei2 qian2 shi4 wan4 wan4 bu4 neng2 de5
containing_words.word: 钱不是万能的，没钱是万万不能的

sentences.english: Leo Fender’s guitars weren’t just versatile, they were also durable.
sentences.chinese: 利奥芬达的吉他不仅万能，而且耐久。

sentences.english: B    God is the all powerful creator and sustainer of the Universe.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是宇宙间万能的创造者和支撑者。

sentences.english: Love is a master key which opens the gate of happiness. (Oliver Wedell Holms)
sentences.chinese: 爱是打开快乐之门的万能钥匙。

sentences.english: Only the mighty God has the power on this dark land to lighten it.
sentences.chinese: 只有万能的上帝才有能力在这个愚昧的国土上教化它。

sentences.english: When moneys speaks the truth is silent.
sentences.chinese: 当金钱万能时，真理无言。

sentences.english: A new dual-breaker air circuit breaker(ACB)was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新型双断点万能式断路器。

sentences.english: Second shot came when I was stupefied by the cannon's omnipotent, pervasive power.
sentences.chinese: 第二杆打在我的大炮的万能的，普遍的权力惊呆了。

sentences.english: I am wiser than to believe what you call money talks.
sentences.chinese: 我不至于可笑到相信你所谓的金钱万能的说法。

sentences.english: Everyone says two hands are better than one, but what would you do if you had no hands?
sentences.chinese: 大家都说双手万能，但是如果你没有手，该怎么办呢？
你怎样能证明“金钱万能”？

sentences.english: The compressive strength of the composite was measured using a electronic universal -testing machine.
sentences.chinese: 复合材料的抗压强度用电子万能实验机测试。

sentences.english: But their faith in government omnipotence could well be misplaced.
sentences.chinese: 不过他们对政府万能的信心可能有些托大了。

sentences.english: We have made [technology] an all-purpose agent of change.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经把技术作为了一种改变的万能中介。

sentences.english: The universal chuck has only three jaws .

definition: magical object/object symbolic of imperial power/fine weapon
Tiger Balm (medicine)/jack of all trades (and master of none)(slang)
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to bring one's own/BYO/(of software) preinstalled
(slang) novice/greenhorn/fool/idiot/abbr. for 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3], pretty boy
